mapper.insert: INSERT INTO find_owner (goods_id, goods_smallkind, goods_postscript, goods_pubtime, goods_contact, goods_contact_way, goods_photo, goods_bigkind, openid) VALUES (#{goodsId}, #{goodsSmallkind}, #{goodsPostscript}, #{goodsPubtime}, #{goodsContact}, #{goodsContactWay}, #{goodsPhoto}, #{goodsBigkind}, #{openid})
